Mage.name: Magic Missle
Mage.description: Launch a magical missile that seeks out an enemy, dealing damage on impact.

Warrior.name: Battle Cry
Warrior.description: Let out a fierce battle cry, increasing the player's attack power for a short time.

Rogue.name: Conceal
Rogue.description: Attempt to hide from enemies, becoming invisible for a short duration.

Rogue.name: Backstab
Rogue.description: Quickly strike an enemy from behind, dealing extra damage.
